original_text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you, or of man's judgment: yea, I judge not mine own self.
korean_text: 너희에게나 다른 사람에게나 판단 받는 것이 내게는 매우 작은 일이라 나도 나를 판단하지 아니하노니

sentences.original_text: But with me it is a very small thing
that I should be judged of you
yea, I judge not mine own self.
sentences.korean_translation: 오히려 나는 나 자신도 판단하지 않습니다.
